content: a trio of textured dishcloths designed by zoe potrac using stylecraft naturals organic cotton dk yarn is available to download free now at woolbox stylecraft naturals organic cotton dk yarn is a more natural and bio-degradable option and comes in a range of shades - from pastels to brights this yarn is ideal for creating these sustainable dishcloths which could be used for the kitchen or as washcloths quick and simple to crochet whilst using different techniques to create the three textures shop the yarn packs to save 5% on the rrp for the yarn required to make the dishcloths or shop the full range of shades to create your own colourway kit include 3 x 100g stylecraft naturals organic cotton dk gypsum 7168 you will also need 4 00mm crochet hook a tapestry needle gauge trinity stitch cloth 16sts x 16 row = 10cm x 10cm waffle stitch cloth 19 sts x 12 row = 10cm x 10cm alpine stitch cloth 17 sts x 13 row = 10cm x 10cm finished size trinity stitch cloth 16cm x 16cm waffle stitch cloth 20cm x 20cm alpine stitch cloth 23cm x 23cm different sizes allow the dishcloths to be displayed hanging one behind the other with all textures visible skill level advanced beginner
